name: Craft Block of Bamboo
goal: Craft a Block of Bamboo from bamboo items using a crafting table
notes: The Block of Bamboo acts as a log equivalent but yields only 2 planks (instead of the 4 planks that normal logs yield). This means bamboo is half as efficient as regular logs for plank production. 9 bamboo -> 1 Block of Bamboo -> 2 bamboo planks. For comparison: 1 oak log -> 4 oak planks. To substitute all 6 logs needed for Iron Tools Pipeline with bamboo, you would need 12 Blocks of Bamboo = 108 bamboo total. Block of Bamboo can also be used as furnace fuel (smelts 1.5 items, same as a log). Requires a crafting table.

steps.title: Obtain bamboo
steps.details: You need 9 bamboo items. Bamboo grows in jungle biomes. Break bamboo stalks to collect them (they break instantly). Bamboo can be planted on grass, dirt, coarse dirt, gravel, podzol, sand, red sand, or mud to grow more. Each bamboo stalk drops 1 bamboo. Bamboo also found in jungle temple chests and shipwreck supply chests.
checks: Have at least 9 bamboo in inventory

steps.title: Craft Block of Bamboo
steps.details: Use a crafting table. Fill all 9 slots of the 3x3 crafting grid with bamboo (9 bamboo). Yields 1 Block of Bamboo. Recipe: { "recipe": "bamboo_block", "count": 1 }. The Block of Bamboo can then be crafted into 2 bamboo planks.
